skins.shipDescription: Centaur-class light aircraft carrier C Centaur.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am called Centaur, name ship of the Centaur-class aircraft carriers. As I was constructed only after the Second Great War, I lived a peaceful life, in spite of it all. And so to me, all the ships of the fleet, even the little destroyer girls, are my Elders. I am at your disposal.
skins.acquisition: So this is the place where all my Elders who fought in the Second Great War gather... Greetings, Commander, I am Centaur, at your service.
skins.login: Commander, I swear to follow the examples of my Elders and strive for greatness once more today!
skins.details: My... appearance? Right, well, my name derives from a mythological creature, so that's why I look rather... fantastical?
skins.secretaryIdle1: By the way, supposing I really was a "Centaur," like a half-man, half-horse? Wouldn't that be funny...? What do you think, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Peaceful, carefree days certainly are lovely, and yet I can't help but wonder from time to time, why was I even born?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Serving as your secretary ship gives me so many chances to interact with the Elders. I can learn so much from them. Thank you, Commander!
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to try pulling my bowstring? Hehe, it's harder than it looks, huh?

skins.shipDescription: Even though I see the ocean every day, changing into this swimsuit gives me a totally new outlook on it. How about you, Commander? Don't you feel at ease?
skins.acquisition: Even though I see the ocean every day, changing into this swimsuit gives me a totally new outlook on it. How about you, Commander? Don't you feel at ease?
skins.login: Commander, what would you say to a stroll on the beach?
skins.details: The Elders haven't been shy about complimenting my figure, though I can't help but feel a little bit embarrassed...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Taking in the ocean, feeling the sea breeze, letting the sounds of the waves lap against my ears... I feel completely at peace here.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Coming to the beach with my Elders, and of course with the Commander, to spend a day off is so delightful.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, Elder Hermes has been talking about this "Summer Duel Tournament" that's about to begin. Why don't we go watch together?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, is this pose okay? How about my expression? Hehe, all right then, make sure you get my good side.

skins.shipDescription: I never imagined you would give me such a splendid dress, Commander... I think it's called a "qipao..." is it? I'll try it, revealing though it is. Wh-what do you think...? Do I look... nice?
skins.acquisition: I never imagined you would give me such a splendid dress, Commander... I think it's called a "qipao..." is it? I'll try it, revealing though it is. Wh-what do you think...? Do I look... nice?
skins.login: Looks like everyone from the Dragon Empery is in the midst of preparing their Spring Festival celebrations, but I'm not sure there's anything I could help with...
skins.details: You want to see me dance...? W-well, I'm not very practiced, but if that's what my Commander wants...
skins.secretaryIdle1: In the coming year, I'll be trying even harder to learn from my Elders!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I learned a special dance from the Elders of the Dragon Empery, I do hope it pleases the Commander and the other Elders.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you're feeling stressed, I could massage your back for you, help you relax a little?
skins.secretaryTouch: These fans and my shawl are so soft to the touch~ Commander, would you like to feel?
